EmailTemplate.description: The template is created to replace the in built template in efortless orders class.
EmailTemplate.name: EffortlessOrders Reject Case
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} Missing Information {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Thank you for submitting your order through MyAerospace. Unfortunately we were unable to process your order because the information described below was not included. Please forward this email to orders@honeywell.com including the referenced information so that we can process your order.
The quickest, easiest way to remedy the problem is to send us a new purchase order with all the blanks filled.
Here’s the additional information we need:
{!Case.Reject_Order_Reasons__c}
Once you resubmit your order at orders@honeywell.com we’ll scan the request again, enter it into the Honeywell SAP system, and then send it on to a Customer Service Representative.
Thank you for your interest in our products! We’re on the lookout for your new order!
Please see below for the part number and other information that you provided on the form.
{!Case.Description}
Honeywell Aerospace Order Support Team Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com
